title: Uncaught Bity error on selecting swap tab
body:
I had run a test Bity swap, and left it idle. I refreshed the page and came back ~20 minutes later. Upon loading the swap tab, I got the red page of death. This is what the terminal showed:

```
Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'ETHBTC' of undefined
    at Swap.render (index.tsx?7e67:154)
    at finishClassComponent (dll.vendor.js:81222)
    at updateClassComponent (dll.vendor.js:81199)
    at beginWork (dll.vendor.js:81574)
    at performUnitOfWork (dll.vendor.js:83573)
    at workLoop (dll.vendor.js:83637)
    at HTMLUnknownElement.callCallback (dll.vendor.js:73891)
    at Object.invokeGuardedCallbackDev (dll.vendor.js:73930)
    at invokeGuardedCallback (dll.vendor.js:73787)
    at renderRoot (dll.vendor.js:83715)

The above error occurred in the <Swap> component:
    in Swap (created by Connect(Swap))
    in Connect(Swap) (created by Route)
    in Route (created by Root)
    in div (created by Root)
    in Router (created by Root)
    in Provider (created by Root)
    in Root
```

This was the state of my redux local storage, in case that's where the issue lies:
```
{
  "config": {
    "gasPriceGwei": 42,
    "nodeSelection": "rin_infura",
    "languageSelection": "en",
    "customNodes": [],
    "customNetworks": []
  },
  "swap": {
    "step": 3,
    "origin": {
      "id": "BTC",
      "amount": 1
    },
    "destination": {
      "id": "ETH",
      "amount": 25.244238
    },
    "options": {},
    "bityRates": {},
    "destinationAddress": "0x7cB57B5A97eAbe94205C07890BE4c1aD31E486A8",
    "bityOrder": {
      "id": "589b41b03b40e6dede477be3e597d7a4f7daf52d38e0b89860912fa82cee1df01d90ae8682f9b14e2b73d68d68f24faeGkjwzZOhvUmEskRQsF8OrA==",
      "amount": 1,
      "amount_mode": 0,
      "pair": "BTCETH",
      "payment_address": "14qSxeeR4E6DYpzv3PM1MdzARPR3isbeVW",
      "payment_amount": "1",
      "reference": "bity.com AESV-NN75",
      "status": "OPEN",
      "validFor": 600,
      "timestamp_created": "2017-12-15T16:36:20.141938Z",
      "input": {
        "amount": "1.00000000",
        "currency": "BTC",
        "reference": "bity.com AESV-NN75",
        "status": "OPEN"
      },
      "output": {
        "amount": "25.24423800",
        "currency": "ETH",
        "reference": "",
        "status": "OPEN"
      }
    },
    "isFetchingRates": false,
    "secondsRemaining": 0,
    "outputTx": "",
    "isPostingOrder": false,
    "orderStatus": "OPEN",
    "orderTimestampCreatedISOString": "2017-12-15T16:36:20.141938Z",
    "paymentAddress": "14qSxeeR4E6DYpzv3PM1MdzARPR3isbeVW",
    "validFor": 600,
    "orderId": "589b41b03b40e6dede477be3e597d7a4f7daf52d38e0b89860912fa82cee1df01d90ae8682f9b14e2b73d68d68f24faeGkjwzZOhvUmEskRQsF8OrA==",
    "originAmount": 1,
    "destinationAmount": 25.244238
  },
  "customTokens": []
}
```

This is reproducible for me, happens every page load.
